snippet.title: Winter Update Launch Trailer | Halo Infinite
snippet.description:
This is the largest update to Halo Infinite yet, bringing with it multiple improvements and highly anticipated features such as Campaign Network Co-Op, Mission Replay, the Forge Beta, and free content for all players.  

Thank you to our players who have stuck by us and provided feedback to improve the overall Halo Infinite experience – the Winter Update marks a big step forward for all of us. 

For more on Halo Infinite's Winter Update: https://aka.ms/WinterUpdateLaunch

#Halo #HaloInfinite #HaloWinterUpdate 
---
